# MKAnnotationView.DragState.ending

**Case**

An annotation view ends dragging.

## Declaration

```swift
case ending
```

## Discussion

A user action indicates the user dropped the view. The map view automatically moves annotation views to this state in response to appropriate user actions.

## Constants

- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.none**: An annotation view that doesn’t have a drag operation.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.starting**: An annotation view begins dragging.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.dragging**: An annotation view is actively dragging.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.canceling**: An annotation view cancels drag operation.
